systems.name: Onboarding System
systems.description: A system designed to introduce new players to the game and help them understand basic operations.
systems.mechanics: Includes first app open, username setup, main menu navigation, and tutorial stages.
systems.objectives: Introduce core functionalities of Tank Wars, create comfort, and encourage continued play.
interactions: Players interact with the main menu and tutorial system.
systems.source_note: Mục đích thiết kế và mục tiêu thiết kế sections in the GDD.

logic_rules.description: Defines the sequence of actions when a player opens the app for the first time.
logic_rules.trigger: Player opens the app for the first time.
logic_rules.effect: Player goes through loading, sets username, and is directed to the main menu with a prompt to find a match in Tutorial mode.
logic_rules.source_note: Journey section, First open app subsection.

logic_rules.description: Defines the sequence of actions during the tutorial phase.
logic_rules.trigger: Player completes the Find Match action in the main menu.
logic_rules.effect: Player enters the tutorial phase to learn game mechanics.

requirements.title: Onboarding Design Documentation
requirements.description: Create comprehensive onboarding documentation to guide Art & Dev teams.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Document includes all stages of onboarding: first open app, tutorial, and finish.
requirements.source_note: Mục tiêu & tổng quan tài liệu section.

requirements.title: Unity Measurement Standard
requirements.description: Ensure all metrics and units follow Unity standards (1 unit Unity = 1 meter).
requirements.acceptance_criteria: All measurements in the game conform to Unity's unit standard.
requirements.source_note: Notes section at the end of the document.
